articles.title: Fleming hits winning 3, leads Maine past Columbia 75-72
articles.description: BANGOR, Maine (AP) — Andrew Fleming sank a long 3-pointer just before the final buzzer in overtime as Maine narrowly defeated Columbia 75-72 on Thursday night.
articles.content:
BANGOR, Maine (AP) Andrew Fleming sank a long 3-pointer just before the final buzzer in overtime as Maine narrowly defeated Columbia 75-72 on Thursday night.

articles.author: By ELLIOTT MOORE For The Associated Press
articles.title: Texas Fishing Report
articles.description: The weekly fishing report as compiled for the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department for Jan. 2 and also available on the internet at https://tpwd.texas.gov/fishboat/fish/recreational/fishreport.phtml:
articles.content: LAKE O' THE PINES: GOOD. Water stained; 57 degrees; 0.62 high. Largemouth bass are good on topwater, spinners, swimbaits, and crankbaits. Crappie are fair on mainly minnows and reeled jigs among structure. Catfish are good on all types of catfish bait, especi… [+1330 chars]
